column3: Digikey is my preferred vendor (Good prices, cheapest shipping, ships from Winnipeg) but Mouser and others are good as well.  Same with eBay/Alibaba/Bangood.
Most components from eBay could be purchased from Digikey, just an increase in cost (but faster shipping!)
DO NOT purchase LED’s from eBay/Alibaba.  Testing has shown that LED’s from untrustworthy vendors are a lower quality.
The EMCB1 and ECC0 board components will come pre-installed on the boards if purchased from td0g.
AA Battery Positive Negative Contact Plate
